file_intent: 3D modeling and simulation of human and wheelchair interactions with parameter optimization.

responsibilities.description: Loads and initializes human and wheelchair models into the scene.
responsibilities.label: Model Loading

responsibilities.description: Calculates and validates optimal parameters for wheelchair and human alignment.
responsibilities.label: Parameter Optimization

responsibilities.description: Updates the geometry of human and wheelchair models based on parameters.
responsibilities.label: Geometry Updating

responsibilities.description: Creates and manages the GUI for user interaction with model parameters.
responsibilities.label: GUI Integration

responsibilities.description: Handles the animation loop and updates based on user interactions.
